directions: Combine the orange juice, cranberry-raspberry juice, pineapple juice, and cinnamon candies in a large stockpot; cook over high heat until the candies dissolve.
Combine the water and tea bags in a separate pot and bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer 5 to 10 minutes; pour into juice mixture. Serve hot.
ingredients: 2 (2.25 ounce) packages small red cinnamon candies
title: Fuss Free Hot Cranberry Tea
